#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    long long  n,i;
    unsigned long long count;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    while(n!=0)
    {
        count=0;
        for(i=n-3;i>=0;i-=2)
        {
            count+=(i*(i+1))/2;
        }
        printf("%llu\n",count);
        scanf("%lld",&n);
    }
    return 0;
}
